actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs..

official_title: A bill to provide for compensation when certain leases or permits for the use of public lands are terminated, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides compensation when an area is needed for public use for leases or permits for an area of public land upon which a summer residence has been constructed or maintained. Provides that if a lessee or permittee is 65 years of age or older, the terms of the lease shall be extended for life, but not more than 25 years.

titles.title: A bill to provide for compensation when certain leases or permits for the use of public lands are terminated, and for other purposes.
